message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. I'm willing to negotiate but time is ticking!
Your turn Alice.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Let's be reasonable, we both lose if this drags on.
I appreciate the offer, Bob. But I still think I deserve more. I'll take 70% and you get 30%. This is my final offer, let's not waste any more time.
Alice, let's be realistic. Time is literally money for both of us, and it's disappearing fast. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Bob, we're both losing money with every passing round. I'm willing to compromise, but I can't go lower than 60%. Let's be reasonable and agree on this split before we both get nothing.
Alice, I'm offering 52/48. You're focused on the percentage, but the actual value you're getting is shrinking fast.  Let's make a deal now before we both lose even more.
